sentence: Leading GOP gubernatorial candidate Doug Mastriano, a state senator, has said he would appoint a secretary of state who would require all voters to re-register before casting their ballots, a move that could dramatically reshape the electorate and would likely violate federal law.
author: Rosalind S. Helderman
title: Leading GOP candidates in Pennsylvania were in Washington on Jan. 6

sentence: Three weeks after the 2020 election was called for Joe Biden, Pennsylvania State Senator Doug Mastriano introduced a resolution to throw out the results of the popular vote and to have the Republican-controlled state chambers appoint their own electorsones that would presumably hand the state to Donald Trump, who was cheated? out of reelection through a corrupt? election process, he said.
author: Eric Lutz
title: Pennsylvanias Republican Primary Clown Show Is Coming Down to the Wire
